entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Deux-Montagnes
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:33 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 20 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
